about_the_game:
Welcome, Traveler!

Enter the Tongs Delta, a desert empire on the shore of the Great Sea.

Help lovely inhabitants by delivering their packages, while riding around on your Giant Turtle.

Immerse yourself in a relaxing journey with beautiful artstyle and soothing music.

FEATURES

In Little Odyssey, you will encounter:

Relaxing Deliveries

Deliver boxes, barrels, vases, mail, stones and many more cargo entrusted to you, from one settlement to another. Earn coins from contracts you can spend on cosmetics or Turtle upgrades, to take even bigger contracts. Plan your route optimally and choose cargo wisely, but don’t feel any pressure: there are no time restraints or hard choices, so you can take this adventure at your own pace!

Multitude of Characters

Along the way you will meet tons of individuals, each with something interesting to share. Learn the history of this place, get some traveling advice, help in a relationship or hear an awful joke: all of it and many more you can expect from those warm and kind people living on the bank of Aorta River!

A Special Friend

But never forget about your traveling companion: your Giant Turtle, which is both your magical mount, and your very close friend. Remember about proper hydration, if you plan to venture anywhere into this fantasy desert. Water is scarce, and can only be refilled in Towns. But even more importantly, make your giant friend feel rewarded for their hard work, so don’t forget to pat their green head ever so often!


💖 You reached the end of the descriptions, congratulations! I’m Simon, the main creator of this game. This project means a world to me, and I wish it could be my breakthrough into making games full-time. If you want to help, you can wishlist the game. It will cost you nothing, but is extremely helpful to creators like me. Take care! 💖

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22
  • Processor: 3 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB of VRAM or more
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Little Odyssey

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 3 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB of VRAM or more
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Relax while traveling around a fantasy desert on your Giant Magical Turtle. Deliver packages and explore the world in your Little Odyssey!
